Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.tips

ToolTips.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
QuickTip A specialized tooltip class for tooltips that can be specified in markup.
Tip This is the base class for ToolTip that provides the basic layout and positioning that all tip-based classes require.
ToolTip A standard tooltip implementation for providing additional information when hovering over a target element.
ToolTipConfig Configuration information for a tool tip.
